Twister/Blizzard


*Twister stops and stands next to Sinesis looking at Ram=
pages Base*



*Blizzard stops and stands next to Sinister looking at the M=
aximal Base*

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, August 06, 2000 12:02 AM
  Subject: Re: The E=
nd is Near...........


  Sinesis arives at Rampage's base.

  Sinister ari=
ves at the Maximal base...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilov=
ealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, August 05, 200=
0 11:45 PM
    Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


    Twister/Blizza=
rd

     
     
    *Twister follows Sinesis towards the Predacon Base*


 =
   *Blizzard walks next to Sinister towards the Maximal Base*

      ----- =
Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
      Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 8:56 PM
      Subject: Re: The End is=
 Near...........


      Sinesis walks toward the Predacon base. Sinister w=
alks toward the Maximal base...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
   From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Sat=
urday, August 05, 2000 8:44 PM
        Subject: Re: The End is Near........=
...


        Twister/Blizzard


        Twister: We'll never know until we=
 try!

        *Twister says to Sinesis*

        Twister: Which way to his=
 base?

        *Twister asks Sinesis*




        *Blizzard holds Sinister=
's hand starts walking towards the Maximal Base*

          ----- Original =
Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
         Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 6:48 PM
          Subject: Re: The=
 End is Near...........


          "Partner's!" Sinesis says. He starts to=
 think.

          "Think Rampage will want us on his side?" Sinesis asks T=
wister.

          Sinister starts toward the Maximal base while holding Bl=
izzard's hand...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From=
: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Sa=
turday, August 05, 2000 6:38 PM
            Subject: Re: The End is Near...=
........


            Blizzard/Twister


            *Blizzard sighs and k=
eeps walking but looks behind her and than doesn't anymore*



            =
Twister: Your right. It's not like she was going to let me stay anyway.

  =
          *Twister stands up*

            Twister: I think we start lookin=
g now. The sooner the better. Partners?

            *Twister says to Sines=
is while holding her fist out for him to hit his on*

              ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:33 PM
      =
        Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


              Sinister li=
stens carefully to the words of Blizzard.

              "Who needs a home,=
 Twister!? Let's just go find another team that wants us and we shall be on=
 our way to glory!" Sinesis said to Twister...
                ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
                To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 6:02 =
AM
                Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


              =
  Blizzard/Twister


                *Blizzard begins walking*

           =
     Blizzard:..Who am I kidding...I don't know what to do, I probably eat =
myself!

                *Blizzard says sadly*

                Blizzard: I=
t seems the the whole world is against me accept for you. Even my sister. I=
 know the way she was acting, not normal.

                *Blizzard says t=
o Sinister and sighs and continues walking*



                *Twister loo=
ks at Sinesis*

                Twister: It was up to me tell the others to=
o but I didn't because I didn't do it before I tried to stop Retroflame and=
 I didn't after because I was too concerned with saving myself....That was =
the past and the future can be different but it isn't looking up now that w=
e have no home...

                *Twister says to Sinesis

              =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
        =
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Saturday, August =
05, 2000 5:51 AM
                  Subject: Re: The End is Near...........
=


                  "Okay." Sinister said lamely. He walked off with Blizza=
rd whenever Blizzard walks off.

                  Sinesis sighs.
         =
          
                  "I always said I never made any mistakes. That=
 I was perfect, but once, I was supposed to fight some criminals that had a=
 bounty on them, but I was not to harm anyone else. I killed that criminal =
for my own selfish needs, but he had a time bomb set. I thoguht I could dis=
arm it, but all I did was set the time even lower, and some bots didn't hav=
e time to get away. I managed to get away since I knew about it, but I neve=
r told them, so that's why I chose the evil path in life, I felt I had done=
 something evil..." Sinesis said...
                    ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
                    From: ilovealllizards 
                    T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 =
5:24 AM
                    Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


     =
               Twister/Blizzard


                    Twister: I was sent o=
n a mission to stop another bot named Retroflame. She planed to blow up som=
e other bots that didn't know a thing because she claimed that they were in=
 her way. I was given no partners for there were none to give. I didn't sto=
p them....I tried but I was shelfish and excaped in a pod thinking of only =
myself and other bots were killed not only because of Retroflame but also b=
ecause of me....I deserved to be near that bomb.....There were missions bef=
ore that but I wish not speak of for I have failed too many.......I wouldn'=
t kill myself for I would probably be sent back down for the Matrix would n=
ot want my selfish kind in.......

                    *Twister says to Sin=
esis*


                    *Blizzard sighs and looks up again still frowni=
ng*

                    Blizzard: We need to find shelter, my love.

     =
               *Blizzard says to Sinister*

                      ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
                      From: THECODE 
                 =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Saturday, August 0=
5, 2000 3:30 AM
                      Subject: Re: The End is Near.........=
..


                      Sinesis walks to Twister.

                     =
 "A failure? When were you a failure? Tell me of one of your adventures on =
Cybertron that was a failure." Sinesis said. Sinister shook his head.

    =
                  "Unbelievable." Sinister said. Stronghold and Blender loo=
k at eahc other. They laugh at Plintissa and Dracona's misfortune and take =
a smoke, then walk off to find another side to join, all the time hoping th=
at Artist suffers and hoping that Twister really is and always will be a fa=
ilure...
                        ----- Original Message ----- 
            =
            From: ilovealllizards 
                        To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
                        Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:22 AM
   =
                     Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


            =
            Twister/Blizzard


                        *Twister looks at wh=
at was left of the base*

                        Twister: I always be noth=
ing but a failer with nowhere to go...

                        *Twister wa=
lks next to the pieces of the base sits down staring at the ground*


     =
                   *Blizzard frowns and a mech tear runs out of her optic*
=

                        Blizzard: I'll never have a place to stay that I c=
an actually call home.....

                        *Blizzard lowers her he=
ad and sighs*

                          ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
                      From: THECODE 
                          To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
                          Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:10 =
AM
                          Subject: The End is Near...........


        =
                  Dracona looked into the pit. Plintissa wasn't moving. Dra=
cona smiled and walked back toward her base. A dagger flew into Dracona's b=
ack. She spun around and grabbed the dagger in pain. Plintissa stood there.=


                          "You do not know when to give up, you fool, but=
 never mind that your an idiot, I'm going to grind you so small you won't b=
e able to be seen with a microscope!" Dracona said. She kept her hand cover=
ed and flung the dagger back. It missed Plintissa and hit Artist in the leg=
. Dracona smiled in satisfaction. Plintissa tackled Dacona and took her dow=
n. Dracona once again turned to her saw blade to saw into Plintissa. Dracon=
a fired an ice beam, but Plintissa dodged. Dracona started to burn everythi=
ng with fire beams. Plintissa still avoids it. Plintissa was always a good =
fighter, but it wasn't until now, after her bad life that she discovered he=
r true fighting power. Plintissa beat Dracona mercilessly. Draocona's parts=
 were flung everywhere as Plintissa spun a simple stick through the air. Dr=
acona raised the saw blade and sliced the stick to pieces. Dracona laughed =
and sliced Plintissa several hundred times. Plintissa fell.

              =
            "Th weak move aside and die so the strong can survive. As ancie=
nt as the Cosmos, that has always been the way of things. I'm sorry Plintis=
sa, you were a good friend, but don't take this personally, it's just busin=
ess." Dracona said.
                           
                          D=
racona pulled back the saw blade and thrust it towards Plintissa. Plintissa=
 grabbed her arm from earlier and threw it. It hit Dracona's blade. Dracona=
 slammed it into Plintissa, but as she did, the blade came loose before it =
hit Plintissa. The blade flew up. Dracona blinked her eye, the one Dinobot =
had scarred when she first arived on the planet. The blade sawed through Dr=
acona and left her in pieces everywhere. Her spark extinguished. Her last w=
ords were:

                          "*Cough, Cough* Zardus I am sorry. Pl=
intissa, do not forget your promise." And Dracona died smiling. Plintissa r=
emembered that she promised Dracona that she would never leave her sitting.=
 Plintissa cried. Her mech fluid ran everywhere and she got weaker and weak=
er. Artist stepped slowly over to Plintissa. He was crying, too.

         =
                 "Artist, I'm sorry it had to end this way." Plintissa whis=
pered.

                          "Why are you leaving me, Plintissa? Why d=
oes everyone betray me?" Artist asked.

                          "Artist, =
there floats Dracona's spark, recover it, we can't part, she really was my =
friend." Artist walked up and captured the extinguished spark as it tried t=
o fly away. He contained it in a capsule.

                          "Plint=
issa, if you leave me, I'll...have no more reason to live, all my friends a=
re gone, my helping days are over." Artist said.

                         =
 "Your helping days are never over, and we'll always be together." Plintiss=
a said.

                          "This isn't some lame thing about how yo=
u'll always be in my heart, is it?"

                          "No, Artist,=
 come here." Plintissa whispered. Artist looked at Team Ultima's base. It w=
as destroyed, the funny thing was, that it was destroyed by Dracona, the ve=
ry one, along with Plintissa, that originally built it. And there it was, s=
ticking above ground now and burning away. Sinesis looks at the base and si=
ghs.

                          "Twister, Dracona is dead, I guess we have =
to leave." Sinesis says. Sinister stands next to Blizzard and sighs.

     =
                     "Blizzard, we need to find another home, now." Siniste=
r said sadly.

                          Artist came closer to Plintissa. H=
er spark suddenly burst from her and floated into Artist's hands. She said =
to him what he needed to do. He opened his chest compartment and his spark =
was revealed. Artist combined Plintissa's spark with his own, they became o=
ne.

                          "Till all are one." Artist whispered really =
low. Plintissa told him she still loved him. Artist was overjoyed! Plintiss=
a was with him now, and now they could never be seperated again. Artist, co=
mpletely ignoring Blizzard and Sinister, and Sinesis and Twister. ran out i=
nto a field.

                          "Artist, now we need to take care o=
f Dracona's spark." Plintissa said. (Remember, only Artist can hear Plintis=
sa now) Artist headed toward the Maximal base, there Dracona would get a ne=
w body, one she could not attack anyone ever again in, and where she can al=
ways be helpful. Artist held up the contained, Dracona's spark still inside=
.

                          "I love you." Artist said seemingly to nobody.=


                          "I love you too." Plintissa said to Artist. Art=
ist continued walking to the Maximal base...
